com.adyrsoft.android.jsinterface

Class JSCameraInterfaceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adyrsoft.android.jsinterface.JSCameraInterfaceManager

  • public class JSCameraInterfaceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    JSCameraInterfaceManager This class manages the events generated from calls from Javascript code. Also communicates with Javascript code
    Author:
    Adrián Pérez

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  JSCameraInterfaceManager.JSCameraInterface 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSCameraInterfaceManager(WebView wv, JSCameraInterfaceManager.JSCameraInterface jSInterface)
      Adds the interface object jSInterface to the provided WebView wv and instantiates this object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSCameraInterfaceManager.JSCameraInterface getJSCameraInterface()
      Returns the interface object in use by this JSCameraInterfaceManager object
      java.lang.String getPictureUri()
      Returns the uri where the picture can be loaded from.
      void OnPictureTaken()
      This must be called when the picture has been taken, so the JS code gets notified about this event.
      void pictureNotNeeded()
      Notifies the Android application that the picture taken is no longer needed.
      void setPictureTakenCallback(java.lang.String callback)
      Sets the callback that this object will call to JS code.
      void takePicture()
      Request the android application to take a picture from the camera.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JSCameraInterfaceManager

        public JSCameraInterfaceManager(WebView wv,
                        JSCameraInterfaceManager.JSCameraInterface jSInterface)
        Adds the interface object jSInterface to the provided WebView wv and instantiates this object.
        Parameters:
        wv - WebView to add the interface to.
        jSInterface - JSCameraInterface to add.

    • Method Detail

      • getJSCameraInterface

        public JSCameraInterfaceManager.JSCameraInterface getJSCameraInterface()
        Returns the interface object in use by this JSCameraInterfaceManager object
        Returns:
        JSCameraInterface instance used by this object.

      • OnPictureTaken

        public void OnPictureTaken()
        This must be called when the picture has been taken, so the JS code gets notified about this event.

      • setPictureTakenCallback

        public void setPictureTakenCallback(java.lang.String callback)
        Sets the callback that this object will call to JS code. Meant to be used from Javascript code.
        Parameters:
        callback - Javascript callback function.

      • takePicture

        public void takePicture()
        Request the android application to take a picture from the camera. setPictureTakenCallback must be called before using this method. Meant to be used from Javascript code.

      • pictureNotNeeded

        public void pictureNotNeeded()
        Notifies the Android application that the picture taken is no longer needed. Meant to be used from Javascript code.

      • getPictureUri

        public java.lang.String getPictureUri()
        Returns the uri where the picture can be loaded from.
        Returns:
        uri Uri object where the picture can be loaded from.
